folder: 125th Street (East)- Harlem River & 2nd Avenue, Manhattan, NY
text:
(1) East 125th Street, north side, west from the Harlem River, to and including Second Ave.
September 17, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from a different angle.
September 17, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Manhattan: 125th Street (East)- Harlem River - 2nd Avenue

title: Manhattan: 125th Street (East)- Harlem River - 2nd Avenue

text:
(1) The north ramp of the Triborough Bridge, while under construction; as seen from Second Ave., and 125th Street.

May 18, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, showing the lift span over the Harlem River at 125th Street, as seen from the First Ave., Bridge.

May 18, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same as view No. 2, at a later date.

May 7, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
(No. 3, not a dry mount item.)
title: Bridges - Triborough Bridge - [Construction.]
